price: And [beware of] the Day when He will call out to them and say, “Where are those whom you claimed to be My partners?”
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ أَيۡنَ شُرَكَآءِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمۡ تَزۡعُمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu ayna shurakāiya alladhīna kuntum tazʿumūna
